remarks:
Closure of multiplication on positive reals.  First statement of Proposition 9-3.7 of [Gleason] p. 124.  (Contributed by NM, 13-Mar-1996.)  (New usage is discouraged.)

 Closure of multiplication on positive reals.  First statement of Proposition 9-3.7 of [Gleason] p. 124.  (Contributed by NM, 13-Mar-1996.)
statement: mulclpr $p |- ( ( A e. P. /\ B e. P. ) -> ( A .P. B ) e. P. ) $.
